text: Pablo is a Cuban village and hamlet belonging to the municipality of Primero de Enero, Pablo on EcuRed in Ciego de Avila Province. It was founded in 1962 and has a population of 671. ==Economy== The economy is centered in the agriculture of sugarcane, livestock and growing various crops. ==Education== Pablo has a primary school for children attending first to sixth grade. ==Health== A Medico de Familia clinic and a pharmacy provide health services to residents. ==See also== *El Canario ==References== Category:Populated places in Ciego de Ávila Province
title: Pablo (Primero de Enero)
